divs: Sighting DetailsI looked out of front window at the snow on the ground, I noticed in front of me three white objects joined together on top of each other. I went to back of window and saw three object, but more solid, with windows facing me also on top of each other. very strange.I wasn't sleeping and before this happenned I awoke sweating. I was up all night.
Summary: there were three connected white, and then I saw again three looked different in back of house,
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There was one other sighting in Atlanta on or around January 8th 2010
